attributes.additional_details:
Apparently, up to 1.3 million are thrown away every week in the UK.
Most of these do not go through the correct route for disposal and just litter our streets and parks.
To put it into perspective 10 tonnes of lithium per year is wasted or enough for 1,200 electric vehicles.
attributes.background: Create a law that bans the sale of single Use Vapes.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/628115
